p.mixed-citation: Campbell title registrations to date—October 2020. Campbell Systematic Reviews. 2020;16:e1130. 10.1002/cl2.1130 37016612

body.p: Details of new titles for systematic reviews or evidence and gap maps that have been accepted by the Editor of a Campbell Coordinating Group are published in each issue of the journal. If you would like to receive a copy of the approved title registration form, please send an email to the Managing Editor of the relevant Coordinating Group.

sec.title: CLIMATE SOLUTIONS

p.italic: Effectiveness of finance for supporting climate change adaptation in the agricultural sector in low‐ and middle‐income countries
